title: The Court of Secrets
description: Darkness can only survive in the hearts of the wicked.I was brought back from the edge of death by Morgana so I could reign. But whilst there, something had latched onto me, and it had no plans on leaving. With each passing day, I feel my heart growing darker and it becoming stronger. Struggling to suppress the beast within, I lose myself in the scandals and politics of my kingdom. Caught between the high priest-Vahaga-and the lords of the land, being in power has never seemed more difficult.The threats of war with Berovia looming on the horizon means I need to remain strong for my people. My coronation nears, but with the mystery surrounding my fatherâ€™s death coming under scrutiny, being back at court has never been so dangerous. Especially for a queen.The Court of Secrets is Book 3 in The Fate of Crowns Series.
author: Rebecca L.  Garcia
